g.text: Administrator wants to fetch content stream
but loadbalancer uses other cluster member
which does not execute the process.
set request refresh time stamp for stream content
and wait until last update timestamp newer or job has been done
Here we have a watcher thread,
write current stream content (file) to DB field
fetch stream content from DB field
End of current process still running case
write file to DB field after process ended
Just fetch final data from DB.
fetch stream content from DB field
